user_query: Can you help me find the document types modified since June 1, 2022, and get all the records modified since July 15, 2022? Additionally, I would like to retrieve the lyrics of the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson using the Chart Lyrics API.

TaskList.description: Find and list all document types that were modified since June 1, 2022.
Get all records that have been modified since July 15, 2022, based on the results from subtask 1.
Retrieve the lyrics of the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson using the Chart Lyrics API.
